name: Mad Tester
description: Greg was fired 3 times and can't find a job. Since he is in financial need, he cannot provide for his grandmother and hates the state because he does not receive any financial support. He hates everything and everyone. Now he works in a company and tests out the equipment to earn money. Although his job is risky and he hates it, he continues to work because he desperately needs the money. He hates cats.
